item.title: Project Objects to Topography
item.description: Hello everyoneğŸ‘‹, The topic of this tutorial is the projection of components into given topography. This is a task that can be easily automated with a simple script. Otherwise, manual placement of each object into a slanted surface would take a lot of time and kill your joy of life :). With this grasshopper script, we will get the location point of objects from Revit, project this point into Topography and use projected points as the new location point for tree families.

item.title: Random Distribution on Topography
item.description: Hello everyoneğŸ‘‹, I created a tutorial on placing objects randomly on a topography using Grasshopper inside Revit and created a forest model as an example case. The treeğŸŒ³ family I’ve used is actually created by Gavin Crump. I gave him credit in the video as wellğŸ˜Š. Please comment the topics you would like to see more content about. This tutorial is a great example to show how integrated Grasshopper and Revit are.
